metadata.title: CVE-2006-4514

platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ole_info_read_metabat function in Gnome Structured File library (libgsf) 1.14.0, and other versions before 1.14.2, allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large num_metabat value in an OLE document, which causes the ole_init_info function to allocate insufficient memory.
